personal.title: Design Technologist
personal.longStatement: As a designer who codes, I thrive at the intersection of design and technology. It's one thing to have an idea. It's another thing to bring that idea to life. My understanding of both design and development allows me to bridge the communication gap and bring designs to life.
personal.shortStatement: As a designer who codes, I thrive at the intersection of design and technology. It's one thing to have an idea. It's another thing to bring that idea to life.
